ProductInfo.Features:
•This Kit includes 13 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
•Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging (Body) - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Zoom Lens - Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens
•16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Focus Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Focus Universal Memory Card Wallet - Focus Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
•Additional LP-E10 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Focus Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
• Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case -5pc Dlx Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection -
